title: Smoked Sausage and Sweetcorn Chowder
ingredients: ['30g butter', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '500ml chicken stock', '450g red potatoes, cut into chunks', '1/4 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '550g sweetcorn', '115g kielbasa sausages, halved and sliced', '75ml milk', '75ml double cream']
